ygData.subject: Re: How addicted??
ygData.msgSnippet: HI I just started playing two weeks ago. My one and only character is Atuari 11th level wizard on the Erollisi Marr server. The longest I ve played at one
ygData.messageBody:
HI I just started playing two weeks ago. My one
and only character is Atuari 11th level wizard on the
Erollisi Marr server. The longest I've played at one
sitting is probably only about 8 hours. I don't play
straight for very long because I get really tired in RL
and end up dying b/c I can't concentrate :)
<br><br>But I am very addicted I have EQ on the brain 24/7. I
am supposed to be writing my dissertation but
instead I come to work and look up loads of information
on EQ sites. i.e. like right now lol. I have
compiled three organized binders full of information and
an additional one with alphebetized maps of norrath.
(Uhhh I might be addicted or just anal)<br><br>Today I
couldn't sleep b/c I was thinking about EQ so I got up at
5 in the morning to play for two hours before work.
I will probably leave work early so I can go and
play. I stopped eating, stopped watching tv, slacked
off on working out and other things I thought used to
be important! Now that I have EQ it seems like those
others things can wait or aren't really that important
:-)<br><br>Hope to run into some of you in Norrath. Atuari is
currently hunting in Q. Hills and BB sometimes W. Karana I
usually play in the morning 5am - 9:30 EST or 3:00pm
-8:00pm EST during the week and it can really vary during
the weekends.
